title: Rhapsody on Salvation
content: Salvation is the master key to a glorious life on earth. It's God's life, power, and nature energizing you to be a new creation, eternally secure and destined for greatness.

prayer.title: Ready for a New Life?
prayer.subtitle: Pray this aloud:
prayer.text: Lord Jesus, I accept Your salvation. I confess my faith and embrace a new life in You.
